pullRequest.title: Initial structure idea for the redesign of the FullDetailsActivity
pullRequest.bodyText:
Basically a very rough draft of an idea on how to structure this. Sorry for my bad Kotlin :D
Basically only works when selecting an Episode of a Show in Up Next

nodes.bodyText: I think we should use our own naming and I prefer "description" instead of "overview"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@
+package org.jellyfin.androidtv.model.itemtypes
+
+import android.graphics.Bitmap
+
+data class Episode (
+	val id: String,
+	val canDelete: Boolean,
+	val canDownload: Boolean,
+	//TODO: Chapters: ArrayList<ChapterInfoDto>
+	val communityRating: Float,
+	val name: String,
+	val overview: String,

nodes.bodyText:
The properties for "canDelete" and "canDownload" are user-permissions and can't be set per-item or per-library afaik. So I'd remove them from the episode pojo and move them somewhere else
Not sure if you can find this information in the UserDto though
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@

+
+import android.graphics.Bitmap
+
+data class Episode (
+	val id: String,
+	val canDelete: Boolean,

@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@
+package org.jellyfin.androidtv.model.itemtypes
+
+import android.graphics.Bitmap
+
+data class Episode (
+	val id: String,
+	val canDelete: Boolean,
+	val canDownload: Boolean,
+	//TODO: Chapters: ArrayList<ChapterInfoDto>
+	val communityRating: Float,

nodes.bodyText: When using .also the this scope won't change so you don't need the val us = this hack.

I'm now thinking we should probably just use the image urls in those objects for now. The episode class could contain a function to get the bitmap.
Also, episodes should probably use the "thumb" image instead of primary (I might be wrong about this though)
Empty function, only calls that only calls it's parent could probably be removed

nodes.bodyText: You can remove the return@withContext part. Kotlin automatically uses the returned value of the last expression.

+				}
+				else -> TODO()
+			}
+
+			supportFragmentManager.beginTransaction().add(android.R.id.content, fragment).commit()

nodes.bodyText:
I'd put the if statement inline so you don't need to repeat the same code twice:
FullWidthDetailsOverviewRowPresenter(detailsDescriptionPresenter, data.primaryImage?.let { DetailsOverviewLogoPresenter() })

commit.message: Initial structure idea for the redesign of the FullDetailsActivity
